## Objectives


At the end of the first part of this lesson, learners will:

1. Understand the risks associated with statistical disclosure; and

1. Demonstrate the ability to create formatted data tables for publication.



At the end of the second part of this lesson, learners will:

1. Demonstrate an understanding of data structures required for visualization and modeling; and

1. Review additional resources to expand their understanding of data analysis and data science.
